newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks up at noon on bull run.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks up at noon on bull run.

text.p: Pakistan stocks gained at midday on Wednesday as the bull run continued for the seventh straight session mainly on buying of Hub Power and telecom utility PTCL shares, dealers said.

"These two stocks have led the rally on the back of foreign and domestic buying and other stocks have also followed suit," dealer Dawar Hasan said. "Now the market is likely to consolidate itself at these levels."
The index rose 5.16 points, or 0.30 percent, to 1,731.33 at midday. Gainers led losers 93 to 44. Hub Power rose 0.40 rupees to 49.30 and MCB 1.65 to 38.50. -- Amir Zia 9221-5685192
